description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

v0.1.0.description:
Welcome to the first release of Honkai: Star Rail Gold and Gears in an Archipelago manual! Archipelago is a cross-game multiworld randomizer. A manual allows one to unlock checks manually, perfect for live service games like Honkai: Star Rail.

# What's in this release?
Requirements:
- Unlocked difficulty up to 5

Goal:
- Clear Difficulty V by collecting all of the Difficulty Increases

Items:
- Paths (You start with a random one)
- Dice (You start with a random one)
- Difficulty Increases (Used to unlock difficulties, you start with Difficulty 1 by default)
- Domains (You can't enter a domain you do not have access to)
- Screwllum and Herta's shop (Have three locations each, so they're marked as progression)
- The Reviver
- The Downloader

Locations:
- Clearing a specific domain
- Buying a curio from Herta (Up to 4)
- Buying a blessing from Screwllum (Up to 4)
- Trailblaze Secrets


# **Future features:**
Locations:
- Each plane of each difficulty
- Clearing domains repeatedly
- Herta Enhance Shop

Yaml Options:
- How many domains you start with
- How many times you have to by from Herta/Screwllum
- How many times you have to enter a domain
- What difficulty you play at
- Turn off secrets
- How many difficulty increases do you need to unlock a given difficulty

**Known issues**
Progression Balancing:
- Currently you unlock a bunch of things at the same time, when you gain access to difficulty 3. This needs to be changed
- Changing what regions go to what to make it more smooth and streamlined
v0.1.0.title: v0.1.0

v0.1.1.description: Welcome to the second release of Honkai: Star Rail Gold And Gears's manual implementation for Archipelago # **What's new in this release?** - More customization options - Multiple location checks per domain # **All Details** Requirements: - Unlocked difficulty up to 5 Goal: - Clear Difficulty V by collecting all of the Difficulty Increases Items: - Paths (You start with a random one) - Dice (You start with a random one) - Difficulty Increases (Used to unlock difficulties, you start with Difficulty 1 by default) - Domains (You can't enter a domain you do not have access to) - Screwllum and Herta's shop (Have four locations each, so they're marked as progression) - The Reviver - The Downloader Locations: - Clearing a specific domain (Variable amount of times, default is 3) - Buying a curio from Herta (Up to 4) - Buying a blessing from Screwllum (Up to 4) - Trailblaze Secrets # **Future features:** Locations: - Each plane of each difficulty - Herta Enhance Shop Yaml Options: - How many domains you start with - How many times you have to by from Herta/Screwllum - What difficulty you play at - How many difficulty increases do you need to unlock a given difficulty
v0.1.1.title: Gold And Gears v0.1.1

v0.1.2.description: Welcome to a new release of Honkai: Star Rail Gold And Gears's manual implementation for Archipelago # **What's new in this release?** - Added Intra-cognition as a requirement for the trailblaze secrets that did not have it - Added locations for beating each plane of each difficulty - Added the rest stop - Changed the name of Herta's and Screwllum's shops - Fixes a bug where there was 1 less domain that you had to enter than was set - Made the locations per shop dynamic # **All Details** Requirements: - Unlocked difficulty up to 5 Goal: - Clear Difficulty V by collecting all of the Difficulty Increases Items: - Paths (You start with a random one) - Dice (You start with a random one) - Difficulty Increases (Used to unlock difficulties, you start with Difficulty 1 by default) - Domains (You can't enter a domain you do not have access to) - Screwllum and Herta's shop - The Rest Area Shop - The Reviver - The Downloader Locations: - Buying curios from Herta - Buying blessings from Screwllum - Buying items from the Rest Area shop - Clearing each plane of each difficulty - Clearing specific domains - Trailblaze Secrets # **Future features:** Items: - Unlockable characters Yaml Options: - What difficulty you play at - How many difficulty increases do you need to unlock a given difficulty
v0.1.2.title: Gold And Gears v0.1.2
